text:
We have configured SSO for HubSpotCMS with Auth0 SAML.
Now we would like to do the same with Cognito.
However, I am having trouble setting it up and was wondering if anyone has any instructions or documentation on how to do this.

I think something is wrong in the attached image.
The cognito side is just using "<https://cognito.handk-inc.co.jp/_hcms/mem/saml/acs>" in the callback.

Perhaps you need to register HubSpot with Federated Identity Provider sign-in?
If so, I'm stumped because I can't get the metadata file URL from the HubSpot side. Also, where is "<https://cognito.handk-inc.co.jp/_hcms/mem/saml>" used?
Hello, does anyone have a similar situation?
